alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Mayes (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 6:07PM CDT until July 27 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Delaware County in northeastern Oklahoma... Central Mayes County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 607 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Salina, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Jay... Pryor... Pryor Creek... Chouteau... Locust Grove... Salina... Langley... Kansas... Adair... Spavinaw... Oaks... Pensacola... Hoot Owl... Rose... Spavinaw State Park... Leach... Chloeta... Twin Oaks... Sportsmen Acres Community... Strang... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
